Interface VehicleDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
VehicleDAOImpl
public interface VehicleDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) interface for managing VehicleDTO entities.

Defines methods for performing CRUD operations and searches on vehicle data.

This interface abstracts the data access layer for vehicles, enabling various implementations for interacting with persistent storage.

Since:
2025-08-07
Version:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • addVehicle

      boolean addVehicle(VehicleDTO vehicle)
      Adds a new vehicle to the data store.
      Parameters:
      vehicle - the VehicleDTO object representing the vehicle to add
      Returns:
      true if the vehicle was successfully added, false otherwise

    • search

      List<VehicleDTO> search(String vehicleNumber)
      Searches for vehicles matching the given vehicle number.
      Parameters:
      vehicleNumber - the vehicle number to search for (can be partial or full)
      Returns:
      a list of VehicleDTO objects matching the search criteria

    • searchAll

      List<VehicleDTO> searchAll()
      Retrieves all vehicles from the data store.
      Returns:
      a list of all VehicleDTO objects

    • searchByVehicleNumber

      List<VehicleDTO> searchByVehicleNumber(String vehicleNumber)
      Searches for vehicles with the exact vehicle number.
      Parameters:
      vehicleNumber - the exact vehicle number to search for
      Returns:
      a list of VehicleDTO objects matching the exact vehicle number

    • updateVehicle

      boolean updateVehicle(VehicleDTO vehicle)
      Updates the information of an existing vehicle in the data store.
      Parameters:
      vehicle - the VehicleDTO object containing updated vehicle data
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • updateStatus

      boolean updateStatus(String vehicleNumber, String status)
